abstract.original_text: One striking characteristic of certain herpesviruses is their ability to induce rapid and 10 widespread RNA decay in order to gain access to host resources. This phenotype is induced by 11 viral endoribonucleases, including SOX in KSHV, muSOX in MHV68, BGLF5 in EBV and vhs in 12 HSV-1.
